categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: This Imperial soldier was a male serving in the army of the reconstituted Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra, during the Cold War in 3642 BBY. He was part of a troop contingent that intercepted a renowned Republic-aligned smuggler during the latter's infiltration of the Okara Droid Factory, and was killed in the ensuing fight.
